Name: Robin Muff
Home-Text: Explore my page and get to know me as a software developer
About-Texts: I am a [[age]] year old software developer from Switzerland. I did a apprenticeship as a computer scientist and I am currently working as a software developer. During my apprenticeship I learned a lot about C#, git, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
My goal is to step into frontend development and learn more about JavaScript, HTML and CSS for a better understanding of the web. Therefore I am currently learning to develope in Vue.js.

In my freetime I do a lot of computer related stuff. I like to play racing games to stay competitive, do some programming or just hang out with my friends. Additionally I like to do some sports, therefor I am a football referee.

Projects.Title: ToDo-Webapp
Projects.Text: A C# based sime webapp for managing your tasks. There are two diffrent ways to manage the tasks, both use a inmemory database. To use it, you need to have something like Postman because there is no UI.

Projects.Title: CRUD-Operations
Projects.Text: A nuget.org package for CRUD-Operations. It is a simple package for CRUD-Operations. The C# project manages a json file and gives you the ability to create, read, update and delete data.

Projects.Title: robinmuff.me
Projects.Text: This website is a simple portfolio website. It is a static website with a little bit of JavaScript. Additionally the data is based of the webserver and loadid via JavaScript.

Projects.Title: robinmuff-school
Projects.Text: On this page you can find all my school projects. Its a archive for every project I did in school.

Experience.Title: Software Developer
Experience.Text: Software Developer at xappido AG. Developing software for customers of xappido AG.

Experience.Title: Process and Systems Manager
Experience.Text: Process and Systems Manager at Schindler Aufzüge AG. Responsible for the development and maintenance of the internal applications.

Experience.Title: Apprenticeship
Experience.Text: Apprenticeship as a Computer Scientist EFZ specializing in Application Development at Schindler Aufzüge AG

Experience.Title: School
Experience.Text: Primary school in Eich, Secondary school in Sempach
